entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:32 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers or flurries near noon. Blowing snow early this morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 along parts of the coast. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 25 March 2023
